title: 3 friends in ranked
body:
So I was just wondering, is it possible to actually get 3 friends on the same team in ranked?

What I mean by this is, if all 3 players are around the same division or in the same divison, is it possible to duo with one of them and then find the third one and get him/her on your team?

I know there would be a possibility of the friend being put onto the other team but, I was just wondering if this was theoretically possible.

replies.body: Oh okay thanks guys! :) I will be hopefully trying this and having some fun with it ahaha.

TSM got 4 members on the same team multiple times on stream. 
SKT got a full 5 man team a couple times on stream. In fact. They had so many SKT members queued at that time that poor Piccaboo was left on the enemy team.

Had this happen last season. It was pretty late at night and we were so excited haha.

Initially we were put on opposing sides (we knew because of the bans that were rolling out) and we banned our friend out. The game dodged though and we re-queued and ended up on the same team!

ofcourse.

in fact once you get really high elo (high diamond +) its not uncommon to play 2 or 3 games in a row with the exact same 10 people.
